1069330.name: Nelly Cootalot: The Fowl Fleet - Original Soundtrack
1069330.description:
Nelly Cootalot: The Fowl Fleet - Official Game Soundtrack

"Nelly Cootalot: The Fowl Fleet - Official Game Soundtrack" features 23 tracks with about 26 minutes of original music! - by Nikolas Sideris.

Once purchased, the soundtrack will appear under Soundtracks in your Steam-client.
It also includes high-quality FLAC-files that can be accessed by browsing local files in the music-player in the Steam-client.

Track listing

1. Bloodbeard Appears.mp3
2. Working In The Mailroom.mp3
3. Cinematic #1 - The Heartless.mp3
4. Rubicund Quay.mp3
5. Cinematic #2 - The Race.mp3
6. In The Races.mp3
7. Vogel Island Beach.mp3
8. Cinematic #3 - The Fleet.mp3
9. The Santiana.mp3
10. Groat Harbor.mp3
11. Van Zandt's Office.mp3
12. Boardwalk And More.mp3
13. Chinatown.mp3
14. Court Room.mp3
15. Too Nice To Leave Out.mp3
16. A Full Bird Battle.mp3
17. Cinematic #4 - Approaching Gloomholm.mp3
18. Walk of Shame #1 - Evil.mp3
19. Walk of Shame #2 - Not Evil.mp3
20. Volcano Crater #1 - Normal.mp3
21. Volcano Crater #2 - Tension.mp3
22. Cinematic #5 - The Battle.mp3
23. Final Credits.mp3
1069330.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
*具有完全音频支持的语言
